```{r}
library(tidyverse)
names <- read_csv("~/Downloads/attendees.csv")
```


```{r}

assign_groups <- function(names, size) {
 num_groups <- floor(nrow(names)/size)
 group_list <- rep(1:num_groups, size +1)
 group_list <- sample(group_list[1:nrow(names)])
 assign_groups <- names %>% mutate(group = group_list) %>% arrange(group)
}

has_repeats <- function(g1, g2) {
    same <- FALSE
    names <- g1$`First Name`
    for (i in 1:nrow(g1)) {
        for (j in seq_along(i)) {
            stud1_g1 <- g1$group[which(g1$`First Name` == names[i])]
            stud1_g2 <- g2$group[which(g2$`First Name` == names[i])]
            stud2_g1 <- g1$group[which(g1$`First Name` == names[j])]
            stud2_g2 <- g2$group[which(g2$`First Name` == names[j])]
            if ((stud1_g1 == stud2_g1) & (stud1_g2 == stud2_g2) & (i != j)) same <- TRUE
        }
    }
    return(same)
}

```




# Project Groups

```{r}
#set.seed(1027)
firstnames <- names[,2]
group1 <- assign_groups(firstnames, 2)
group2 <- assign_groups(firstnames, 2)
while(has_repeats(group1, group2)) {
    group2 <- assign_groups(firstnames, 3)
}
group3 <- assign_groups(firstnames, 3)
while(has_repeats(group1, group3) | has_repeats(group2, group3)) {
    print("trying again")
    group3 <- assign_groups(firstnames, 3)
}
```
